td.content: s:patient presents with Kidney. she is a 36 YO white F speech therapist. she states she has never smoked a cigarette in her life occasional EtOH o:Height 170 cm, Weight 58 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16, US Kidney shows B/L hydoureter and hydronephrosis a:Acute Renal Failure p:administered AVAPRO - 150 mg by mouth daily, performed US Kidney, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

s:pt says she is having symptoms of Kidney 2-4 x day, mostly during the day. she is a female aged 38 ys. she drinks alcohol occasionally she denies smoking o:Height 170 cm, Weight 58.7 kg, Temperature 37.3 C, Pulse 67, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 17 a:Acute Renal Failure p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Isotonic Saline (0.9%) - 10 mL/kg per dose, and ordered US Kidney.
